definition: Longling county in Baoshan 保山[Bao3 shan1], Yunnan
dragon/CL:條|条[tiao2]/imperial
surname Long
mound/tomb/hill/mountain
Longling county in Baoshan 保山[Bao3 shan1], Yunnan

sentences.english: Longling County and Longyang district have also reported dog bites.
sentences.chinese: 龙陵县和隆阳区也报道过有人被狗咬伤的情况。

sentences.english: In the Longling City proper, there still remain many historical traces of the activities of the Japanese invasion in China.
sentences.chinese: 在龙陵城区仍保留了许多日军侵华活动的各种遗迹。

sentences.english: Longling is compared to a landscape painting with superb natural scenery.
sentences.chinese: 人们把龙陵比喻成一幅风光秀丽的山水画。

sentences.english: Longling was an important passage of the famous "South Silk Route" in history.
sentences.chinese: 龙陵是历史上著名的“南方丝绸之路”的重要通道。
